channel.title: 614 Client Help
channel.description:
[quote="Samih1996, post:210, topic:355776"]Where in the client can i change the port? I wan't to change the port to "5555" because i'm allready hosting a 562 server and i want to develop this one on my spare time. So i can release it after.
I hope i will get a reply for this because i dontknow where to change the stupid port!! *CLIENT PORT*[/quote] Can anyone help me with that issue above please?
